nodes.name: createPlay
collect
createPlay
collect

collect(address,bytes32,address,bytes).details: The msg.sender should be the gamblingManager, anyone can collect a bet without be the player A or B.

params._player: Who play the bet, can be the player A or B.

collect(address,bytes32,address,bytes).return: The amount that will be transferred to the _player

createPlay(bytes32,address,bytes32,bytes.details: The msg.sender should be the gamblingManager, anyone can collect a bet without be the player A or B.

params._data: Look in _decodeCreatePlayData documentation for more information
params._player: Who create and play the bet as player A

createPlay(bytes32,address,bytes32,bytes.return: The amount needed to place the bet
